metadata.title: Azure Support Engineer
metadata.subtitle: Become the Hero Who Saves Azure Environments
metadata.description: Transform into the Azure Support Hero that businesses desperately need. Master the art of troubleshooting, incident management, and customer support that keeps enterprises running smoothly in the cloud.
prerequisites: Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104) or equivalent experience

highlights: Be the hero who saves critical systems
Master crisis management in the cloud
Become the trusted advisor enterprises rely on
Turn chaos into calm with expert troubleshooting

overview.summary: Become the Azure Support Hero that enterprises desperately need. When systems fail and businesses are at risk, you're the one they call. Master the art of crisis management, expert troubleshooting, and customer support that keeps the digital world running smoothly.
objectives: Transform into the hero who saves critical Azure environments
Master crisis management and incident resolution under pressure
Become the trusted advisor that customers rely on during chaos
Develop superhero-level troubleshooting and diagnostic skills
Learn to turn system failures into opportunities for excellence
Build the confidence to handle any Azure challenge that comes your way
overview.targetAudience: Aspiring heroes who want to be the ones businesses call when everything goes wrong. IT professionals ready to level up from reactive support to proactive problem-solving excellence.

modules.title: Becoming the Support Hero
modules.description: Transform from reactive support to proactive hero status
objectives: Master the hero's mindset for Azure support
Learn to communicate with confidence during crises

Build the trust that makes customers rely on you
Master the art of turning problems into opportunities

faq.question: Do I need customer support experience?
faq.answer: While helpful, it's not required. The course covers both technical Azure knowledge and customer support best practices.

faq.question: What Azure services are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers troubleshooting for all major Azure services including VMs, networking, storage, databases, and PaaS services.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a technical course focused on Azure troubleshooting and support. You should have basic Azure administration knowledge.

faq.question: Will I learn about Microsoft support?
faq.answer: Yes, the course covers how to work with Microsoft support, understand support plans, and coordinate incident resolution effectively.
